GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
misc: ocxl: fix possible refcount leak in afu_ioctl()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 66032c43291672bae8b93184d2806f05be3e16df, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 060146614643ddc5978c73ffac0329762b4651c9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: ocxl: fix possible refcount leak in afu_ioctl()
